api_list.name: Search

required_parameters.name: weiboSearchType
required_parameters.description:
_1 :综合(Default)
_3 :用户(User)
_21 :文章(Article)
_32 :主页(Homepage)
_38 :话题(Topic)
_60 :热门(Hot)
_61 :实时(Intime)
_62 :关注(Focuse)
_63 :图片(Picture)
_64 :视频(Video)
_92 :地点(Place)
_97 :商品(Product)
_98 :超话(Super Chat)

optional_parameters.name: extStarttime
optional_parameters.description: Begin second page, input previous page data's ext_trans.ext_starttime

optional_parameters.name: sinceId
optional_parameters.description: Begin second page, input previous page data's cards[-1].mblog.id
